title: What if Christopher Columbus landed Africa instard of landing in America? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: He would have probably been detained by the Portuguese crown who already had a presence in West Africa, and who were enemies of the Castilian (Spanish) crown, under whose charter Columbus was sailing. But that wouldn’t make much sense because Columbus was convinced that if he sailed due west he would reach Asia, which is where he was attempting to go. He was an excellent dead reckoning navigator and would not have mistaken south for west, although his reckoning while in the Caribbean did lead him to believe that he was at around the 40th parallel. Source: The Admiral of the Ocean Sea: A Life of Christopher Columbus, Samuel Eliot Morison

Instead of all Mayan and Inca people, all the African tribes would have been massacred by the European settlers and there would have been an United States of Africa, a Spanish State, another French nation etc in the huge continent and today Africa would have been a White continent, much more richer and powerful than the Americas! Mayan and Inca people, with their ancient knowledge of the land and universe would have built their own empires in American lands and their great culture would have flourished across the continents and the world.
